textBox.richText: We celebrated several birthdays in a row. Jan’s birthday was taken care of with minimal pomp, a modest affair for an event to be mourned. Jan got a new TV (a 42” Samsung DLP, not bad). Nadia’s birthday was more festive with 7 little girls and 3 boys running around the house. The weather was warm and pleasant. Everyone had a good time. Olga’s birthday was an occasion for us to spend an evening at work. (And she is getting the entire DVD collection of Sex and The City). Pictures are here. Big news: Olga is a Swiss citizen now! Only eight years of procedure -- we still need to go to Chicago for a passport. But this is really great.
